metadata.name: LADY IN RED
metadata.description:
Let the mystery of the night bring alive the Red spirit within you.

Digital collage animation made in Adobe Photoshop and After Effects.

A high quality, signed print of the still-image artwork will be sent to the first collector of this NFT for free, if interested. Claim through DM on Twitter or Instagram.

MP4, 1842 Ã— 2304 px, 30fps.
